Package jgame

Class World.Edge

java.lang.Object
jgame.Entity
jgame.World.Edge
Enclosing class:
World
public class World.Edge extends Entity
This is an Entity for checking collisions with World boundaries, via Entity.collisionWithType(World.Edge.class), or similar methods

  • Field Details

    • direction

      public final Direction direction
      The Direction this wall occupies, e.g. the right edge of the world has the direction EAST

  • Method Details

    • rawPaint

      public void rawPaint(Graphics g)
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Applies the appropriate transform to the passed Graphics object, then passed it to Entity.paint(Graphics).

      Override this method if you want to control whether to respect the Entity's position, otherwise override Entity.paint(Graphics)
      Overrides:
      rawPaint in class Entity
      Parameters:
      g - The untransformed graphics to draw on

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      This method is called when the World first starts. Setup should include anything that needs to be done before the Entity first displays
      Specified by:

    • update

      public void update()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      This method is called every time the Game updates, based on it's specified framerate. All game logic, like movement or combat, should be implemented here.
      Specified by:
      update in class Entity
      See Also:
      • Game.setFramerate(double)
